content.raw: Hugo and I talked this morning about how we both don't really like this tutorial. I think a much better set of instructions would be to create an empty world, add some objects, and then tell the user how to spawn Atlas into their new world. This PR is fine for now though, I'll create an issue for the new tutorial idea.
